title: Packers clinch NFC, Buccaneers win despite AB mutiny, Bengals Impressive win over Chiefs, Cris Carter and Nate Burleson, plus a MNF preview!
itunes:title: Packers clinch NFC, Buccaneers win despite AB mutiny, Bengals Impressive win over Chiefs, Cris Carter and Nate Burleson, plus a MNF preview!
description:
In the latest edition of the Good Morning Football Podcast, hosts Kay Adams, Kyle Brandt, Peter Schrager, and Hall of Famer Cris Carter dive into 2022 with the Packers clinching home field advantage through the playoffs. Kyle questions if Lambeau is such a huge advantage, but believes the bye week is far more important. The Bucs comeback win is overshadowed by Antonio Brown's 3rd quarter exit from the field and team, but Cris thinks the situation is disappointing because Brown looks like a person in crisis and could need serious help. The Bengals clinched the AFC North and look like they could beat any time. Cris Carter weighs in on the AB situation with the Bucs, plus we get a MNF preview of Browns-Steelers.

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
